pages.text: $(li)The Ice Armor is a bit better than the $(l:patchouli:armors/cactus_armor)Cactus Armor$(/l), $(l:patchouli:armors/melon_armor)Melon Armor$(/l), and $(l:patchouli:armors/pumpkin_armor)Pumpkin Armor$(/l).$(br)$(li)If you wear a complete set, you will get the Frost Walker effect.$(br)$(li)This effect makes you to turn the water into Frosted Ice when you walk near it.

pages.name: Ice Armor
pages.text: You will be immune to damage caused by Magma Blocks and Campfires when you step on them.
